pkgmetadata.longdescription: Monotonize point and interval functional estimates by rearrangement // This package implements the rearrangement operator (Hardy, Littlewood, and Polya 1952) for univariate, bivariate, and trivariate point estimates of monotonic functions. It additionally provides a function that creates simultaneous confidence intervals for univariate functions and applies the rearrangement operator to these confidence intervals.
